import React from 'react' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import Axios from "axios" import Image from 'next/image' import Link from 'next/link' export default () => { const router = useRouter() const ip = router.query.ip const turnTheLight = () => { Axios.post(`http://${ip}/saida01`).then(() => console.log("ok")) } return (

{router.query.room}

) }
